detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Cap in a cotton weave with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked top in soft jersey. Short, elasticated puff sleeves in an airy weave with a frill trim, and a straight-cut hem.

Oversized jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Hood with a faux fur lining and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the back, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Diagonal handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a back section in woven fabric. Jersey-lined front.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and a hole pattern at the front and along the sleeves. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Checked shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Two-button jacket in a cotton weave with notch lapels, a decorative chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an all-over print and regular, elasticated waist. Side pockets, low crotch and tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Knee-length jacket in a sturdy, patterned weave with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, discreet pockets in the side seams and tape-trimmed inner seams. No fasteners. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
V-neck T-shirt in organic cotton jersey. Regular fit.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in crisp cotton poplin with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Clamdiggers in soft, airy cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Front pockets, flap back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.

Tunic in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top, low dropped shoulders and wide 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the hem and decorative gathers at the back of the neck, shoulders and sleeves. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with an open chest pocket.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and tie detail at the hem.
Nightslip in crushed velvet with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide lace trim.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
High-waisted stretch twill trousers in a cotton blend. Fly with a visible zip, fake front pockets and slim legs.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.

Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Adjustable lacing at the front. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Can be washed and reused.
Pleated skirt in an airy weave with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), button fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with a frill around the armholes.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Short blouse in a cotton weave with flounces, a small stand-up collar with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Top and pair of trousers in organic cotton. Top in soft jersey with buttons at the top. Trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, leg pocket with a decorative button, and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, loose, rib-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline and long raglan sleeves with wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs.
T-shirts in soft,organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.

Shirt woven in a viscose blend with a sheen. Turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long knitted jumper in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover polo neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top that continues over one shoulder. Lined at the front and crotch.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back, fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.

Sleeveless playsuit in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. Frill-trimmed shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail and cut-out section at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist with pleats and diagonal side pockets. Scallop edges at the shoulder straps and hem. Lined.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with frills down the sides.

Fully lined, lace shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a gentle V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length lace dress with a bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey. Scallop-edged V-neck front and back, and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Leather sandals with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Calf-length leather skirt with a high waist, concealed zip in one side, decorative stitching, and a slit at one side of the front. Half-lined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, tapered legs and reflective details.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in airy cotton with a collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft weave with a lace yoke and button placket. Scalloped lace trim around the neckline and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a faux fur pompom at the top and embroidery on the turned-up hem.
Jacket in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cold shoulder top in soft printed jersey with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short clown dress in patterned velour with a deep neckline, pompoms at the front and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a collar that is attached at the back of the neck, made of a double layer of wide flounces in an airy weave with a contrasting colour trim. Seam at the waist with an elastic waistband in a contrasting colour and a jersey-lined balloon skirt.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Lace suspender belt with narrow adjustable straps with concealed clips at the ends and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Top for a dog in lightweight, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, openings for the front legs and a large opening for the back legs.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a zip fly with a button.
